newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures expand gains, just off highs.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures expand gains, just off highs.

text.p: May 8 - IMM currency futures built gains, just below peaks. Brokers tied rise near Europe's close to technical buying as yen, Swiss each gained ground in crosses. Some expect mark resistance at $0.5881 or 1.7050, and $0.5898. Intervention fears supported yen. Sterling up after UK Treasury denied wire report about possible pound ERM re-entry at 2.50 marks.
